info.author: Wai Yip Tung
info.description:
pyregex is a command line tools for constructing and testing Python's regular 
expression. Features includes text highlighting, detail break down of match 
groups, substitution and a syntax quick reference.

Requires an ANSI terminal or Python Win32 Extensions on Windows for coloring.

**2006-03-13 note about network outages**
Due to intermittent network outages, please use the alternative mirror URL [
http:
//members.dslextreme.com/users/tungwaiyip/software/pyregex.html] if the main 
URL 
does not response.
info.name: pyregex
info.summary: a command line tools for constructing and testing Python's regular expression
info.html_description:
pyregex is a command line tools for constructing and testing Python’s regular expression. Features includes text highlighting, detail break down of match groups, substitution and a syntax quick reference.

Requires an ANSI terminal or Python Win32 Extensions on Windows for coloring.

2006-03-13 note about network outages Due to intermittent network outages, please use the alternative mirror URL [ http: //members.dslextreme.com/users/tungwaiyip/software/pyregex.html] if the main URL does not response.
